alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Eastern Windham; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 5:16PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...SNOW SQUALL... HAZARDS...A snow squall which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 515 PM EST, a snow squall was along a line extending from near Mount Tabor to 6 miles southwest of Stratton to Grafton and moving east at 60 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... Londonderry and Stratton around 520 PM EST. Wilmington and West Wardsboro around 525 PM EST. North Adams and Adams around 530 PM EST. Townshend, Stamford, Florida and Newfane around 535 PM EST. Brattleboro, Bellows Falls, Monroe, Putney, Readsboro and Walpole around 540 PM EST. Charlestown around 545 PM EST. Westmoreland around 550 PM EST. Guilford Center around 555 PM EST. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&
